original_title: Swing into Action: New Zealand’s Tour of Sri Lanka 2024 on Dialog Television
original_body_lines: Cricket fever is set to ignite as Dialog Television proudly presents the highly anticipated New Zealand Tour of Sri Lanka from 9th to 19th November. This thrilling series promises to be filled with excitement as Sri Lanka’s talented squad takes on the formidable New Zealand team at multiple stadiums in Sri Lanka, including venues in Dambulla and Pallekele.

Adding to the anticipation, Sri Lanka triumphed in their last encounter against New Zealand during the recent tour, which has surely boosted the confidence of the home side. The rivalry between Sri Lanka and New Zealand has produced some memorable encounters, and this tour is expected to add another chapter to their storied history. Fans will be eager to see key players like Sri Lanka’s explosive batsman Kusal Mendis and rising star Wanindu Hasaranga, who have consistently made headlines with their remarkable skills. New Zealand, on the other hand, will rely on the experience of veterans such as Mitchell Santner and the fiery pace of Lockie Ferguson. With both teams showcasing a blend of experience and youth, the series is poised to highlight some of the best talent in international cricket.

Viewers can watch the matches live on Ten Cricket (channel no. 65) and Sony Sports 5 HD (channel no. 124), ensuring they experience every boundary, wicket, and thrilling moment. Mark your calendars for 9th to 19th November and prepare for an unforgettable experience. Whether watching on your television or streaming via your mobile device, Dialog Television is your ultimate destination for the New Zealand Tour of Sri Lanka 2024.
